com.soa.alert.reporter

Interface AlertReporter


  • public interface AlertReporter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void alert(AlertCondition condition)
      This is a variant of alert method that takes the subject along with AlertCondition.
      void alert(AlertCondition condition, java.lang.Object subject)
      Reports an alert for the specified condition and subject (if any).

    • Method Detail

      • alert

        void alert(AlertCondition condition,
           java.lang.Object subject)
    throws com.digev.fw.exception.GException
        Reports an alert for the specified condition and subject (if any).
        Parameters:
        condition - AlertCondition holding information about what has occured that warrants an alert.
        subject - Optional subject of the alert condition, i.e., message, service, or SLA. The Class of Object must be pre-registered with the Alert Framework.
        Throws:
        com.digev.fw.exception.GException - Thrown if unable to report the alert or if the type of subject provided is invalid.

      • alert

        void alert(AlertCondition condition)
    throws com.digev.fw.exception.GException
        This is a variant of alert method that takes the subject along with AlertCondition. When this method is used, implementation will send the default Subject that it is initialized with.
        Parameters:
        condition -
        Throws:
        com.digev.fw.exception.GException
